Maybe, just maybe, it could have ended better for the innocents. The idiots are the ones that need to be deterred.

Just remember that many of you have put the challenges of inner cities on President Obama. Not the mayors or governors. Going forward after January 20th, Donald Trump will be held to that same standard. The republicans have control of the senate, congress, White House and most state governors. They will have to do it with no help from liberals or democrats. No excuses. Good luck.

For lying drug dealers who used two innocent children to draw in a sh## load of money to save their own a$$...not to mention the many that searched for these boys at their own expense and the many many many emotionally involved in that.. If that had been MY son, I would have been searching for him night and day...not sitting at home waiting for news AND if Donald Trump offered to send a fleet of ships to search, I would NOT have turned him down! NOR would I have been touring the Bahamas while others diligently searched for my son... Unless I knew he was there!!!!

I understand the child needed to be saved, but when an endangered animal has to be executed, shouldn't someone be responsible?!! If you're not watching your child and he in turn, causes major damage to property of any sort...typically someone would be held responsible ....but there is no price to the loss of an endagered animal? There is negligence here somewhere! At the very least, changes need to be made to prevent this from ever happening!
